    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Country

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:CountryCode_ISO3166
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Country

      • Description

        ISO 3166 code for a country.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Assigned XSD Type: {http://chameleon.anonymous/ns}ISO3166

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Country name="Ireland" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">IR</Country>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Country" : {
    "value" : "IR",
    "name" : "Ireland"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        name
        The name or code of a country (e.g. as used in an address or to specify citizenship of a traveller).
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Ireland
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
